'''Mythcon 43''' was the forty-third annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Myths and legends from Europe and Asia meet and mingle"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Prof. G. Ronald Murphy (myth and folklore scholar), and Malinda Lo (fantasy author)
